comments.text:
Created attachment 583229
Comparaison between the new style, and the old one (on firefox)

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:10.0a2) Gecko/20111220 Firefox/10.0a2
Build ID: 20111220042029

Steps to reproduce:

I've updated my version of Ubuntu. Since the 11.04 update, the native scrollbar style has changed.


Actual results:

Firefox doesn't support the new style. Instead Firefox applies the old style.


Expected results:

I think it would be nice that Firefox applies the new scrollbar style on Ubuntu.
